text: to shaayad tum usamen se kuchh chhod baithoge, jo tumhaaree or prakaashana roop mein bhejee ja rahee hai. aur tum is baat par tangadil ho rahe ho ki ve kahate hai, "usapar koee khazaana kyon nahin utara ya usake saath koee farishta kyon nahin aaya?" tum to keval sachet karanevaale ho. har cheez allaah hee ke havaale hai
